sentences.english: By the tenfold blasts of the Arctic zone.
sentences.chinese: 那风比北极的烈风千倍狂暴。

sentences.english: The colorless green ideas sleep furiously.
sentences.chinese: 无色的绿色主意狂暴地睡着。

sentences.english: I seized the largest brush and fell upon my wretched victim with wild fury.
sentences.chinese: 我抓住了最大的刷子，狂暴地扑向我的受害者。

sentences.english: The Berserking power-up found in Battlegrounds makes no sound when acquired.
sentences.chinese: 在战场吃狂暴现在没有声效。

sentences.english: A high wind blustered round the house, and roared in the chimney it sounded wild and stormy .
sentences.chinese: 大风绕屋咆哮，并在烟囱里怒吼，听起来狂暴猛烈。

sentences.english: A berserker wizard gets no score for treasure.
sentences.chinese: 一个狂暴的巫术师得不到珍贵的记号。

sentences.english: They are only found in one of three lakes in Terokkar forest.
sentences.chinese: 狂暴龙虾只有在泰罗卡森林的三个湖里可以钓到。

sentences.english: You must be raging and have at least one unused barbarian rage power.
sentences.chinese: 你必需处于狂暴并有最少一项未用的蛮子狂暴威能。

sentences.english: You must be raging and have at least one unused barbarian rage power.
sentences.chinese: 你必需处于狂暴并有最少一项未用的蛮子狂暴威能。

sentences.english: You must answer it; and that violence does not alarm me.
sentences.chinese: 你必须回答，你那种狂暴并不能吓坏我。

sentences.english: The  infinite sky is motionless overhead And the restless water is  boisterous.
sentences.chinese: 头上无垠的天空静止，不息的海水狂暴。

sentences.english: At this diabolical violence I rushed on him furiously.
sentences.chinese: 看到这穷凶极恶的狂暴，我愤怒地冲到他跟前。

sentences.english: Aurra attacked ferociously, but Aayla bested her.
sentences.chinese: 奥拉狂暴地出手攻击，但艾拉将她击败。

sentences.english: We try not to use the "Berserk" term for nothing else but these kinds of timers.
sentences.chinese: 我们只会在这种时限中使用“狂暴”这个词。

sentences.english: If we are not pleased anymore, even the most arrogant tyrannies should get down on their knees.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们都不高兴了，再傲慢狂暴的政府也得跪下。

definition: to fly into a rage/to rage violently
storm/violent commotion/fig. crisis (e.g. revolution, uprising, financial crisis etc)
